sentences: Co-Chair Konaté introduced the text forwarded by AWG-KP 8 held in June 2009 (FCCC/KP/AWG/2009/9) and the revisions made during the informal session in August (FCCC/KP/AWG/2009/12).
He proposed using the seven negotiating slots for both drafting and contact groups with the goal of finishing the group s work in Bangkok.
Parties agreed to meet first in a contact group to discuss broader issues.
